locations.name: Cairo
locations.description: Egypt's bustling capital, initial base for exploring the Giza Pyramids and the Egyptian Museum.

locations.name: Aswan
locations.description: Southern city on the Nile where travelers board the cruise ship for overnight stays while sailing north.

locations.name: Luxor
locations.description: Disembarkation point from the Nile cruise and location for overnight stays while exploring the Valley of the Kings, Karnak, and Luxor Temples.

locations.name: Hurghada
locations.description: Red Sea coastal resort town, the final location for overnight stays focused on relaxation and water activities.
